title: iPad Air 4 is now $60 cheaper in this Black Friday Walmart deal
author: james-peckham
summary: Save $60 off the latest iPad Air model
article: The iPad Air 4 is one of the very best iPad models you can buy right now, and it has been discounted in the early Black Friday Walmart deals with $60 off this versatile tablet.

(Struggling to work out which iPad to buy? We're doing our lovely iPad Black Friday live blog to find all the good deals for Apple's tablet over the sales period).
